strings: <Cap><leader> discovers a new recipe for the alchemy pot!
<Cap><string_1> <equal> <Cap><string_2> + <Cap><string_3>
<Cap><string_1> <equal> <Cap><string_2> + <Cap><string_3> + <Cap><string_4>
<se_low>Yangus: I shoulda known a bird wouldn't get a story like ours, guv.
<se_low>Yangus: Still, no skin off my nose.
<se_def>*: Imagine the effort it must have taken to go from rafts and the like to enormous vessels like this. It's absolutely fascinating!
<se_def>*: Listen to me going on! I often end up musing about civilisation when I'm on a boat. Must be the sea air!
<se_def>*: Do I go straight on to Maella Abbey for the straight life, or do I go down, down to good ol' Pickham town!?
<se_def>*: I s'pose this is like a crossroads in me life, really. Decisions, decisions!
<se_low>*: Cleared up nice today, eh? This is boat travel at its best!
<se_low>*: It's days like these that make me think how the life of a sailor ain't half bad!
<se_def>*: Eh... That girl over there looking out at the sea... Is it really Miss Jessica from Alexandria!?
<se_def>*: I, I thought so! What a turn up for the books that is! She's every sailor's dream! I never thought I'd get to see her up close!
<se_def>*: N-No, course not! What would a lady like her be doing on a ship like this!?
<se_high>Jessica: Oh, hi, <hero>. Or should I call you ‘guv’!?
<se_high>Jessica: Sorry, just joking! That kind of thing isn't really my style.
<se_high>Jessica: I was just looking out across the sea and thinking about Dhoulmagus.
<se_high>Jessica: I wonder why he went over to the southern continent.
<se_high>Jessica: And I wonder what will be waiting for us when we get there... It makes me nervous just thinking about it.
<se_def>*: That horse tethered up over there is a real beauty. I don't think I've ever seen such a fine beast.
<se_def>*: The more I look at her, the more elegant she seems...
<se_def>*: I'm at a loss!<page>*: That monster-like creature's gone and made himself comfortable in my room! Doesn't a captain command ANY respect nowadays!?
<se_def>*: I've asked him over and over again to leave, but he just says that someone more important than me needs the use of it.
<se_def>*: He's gone and strewn his luggage all over the place as well! The cheek of it!
